import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { getCommentsAsync } from '../actions' import Moment from 'react-moment' class Comments extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.dispatch(getCommentsAsync(this.props.postId)) } render() { console.log(this.props.comments) return (

Comments

    {this.props.comments.length > 0 && this.props.comments.map(comment => (
    {comment.timestamp}
    {comment.voteScore}
    {comment.author}
  • {comment.body}
    • )) }
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return state } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Comments)
